text: The Copa del Generalísimo 1954 Final was the 52nd final of the King's Cup. The final was played at Estadio Chamartín in Madrid, on 20 June 1954, being won by Valencia CF, who beat CF Barcelona 3-0. ==Details== {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan="4"|Valencia CF: |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK ||1 || Quique |- |DF ||2|| Juan Carlos Quincoces |- |DF ||3|| Salvador Monzó (c) |- |DF ||4|| Sócrates |- |MF ||5|| Pasieguito |- |MF ||6|| Antonio Puchades |- |FW ||7|| Daniel Mañó |- |FW ||8|| Antonio Fuertes |- |FW ||9|| Manuel Badenes |- |FW||10|| Enrique Buqué |- |FW||11|| Vicente Seguí |- |colspan=4|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| Jacinto Quincoces |} |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align=center |colspan="4"|CF Barcelona: |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK ||1|| Juan Velasco |- |DF ||2|| Josep Seguer |- |DF ||3|| Gustau Biosca |- |DF ||4|| Joan Segarra |- |MF ||5|| Andreu Bosch |- |MF ||6|| Isidre Flotats |- |FW ||7|| Estanislau Basora |- |FW ||8|| Luis Suárez |- |FW ||9|| César (c) |- |FW||10|| Moreno |- |FW||11|| Eduardo Manchón |- |colspan=4|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| Ferdinand Daučík |- |} |} ==References== 1954 Copa Category:FC Barcelona matches Category:Valencia CF matches
title: 1954 Copa del Generalísimo Final
